verses.verse: Now when these things<WH428> were done,<WH3615> the princes<WH8269> came<WH5066> to<WH413> me, saying,<WH559> The people<WH5971> of Israel,<WH3478> and the priests,<WH3548> and the Levites,<WH3881> have not<WH3808> separated themselves<WH914> from the people<WH4480> <WH5971> of the lands,<WH776> doing according to their abominations,<WH8441> even of the Canaanites,<WH3669> the Hittites,<WH2850> the Perizzites,<WH6522> the Jebusites,<WH2983> the Ammonites,<WH5984> the Moabites,<WH4125> the Egyptians,<WH4713> and the Amorites.<WH567>

Then were assembled<WH622> unto<WH413> me every one<WH3605> that trembled<WH2730> at the words<WH1697> of the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> because<WH5921> of the transgression<WH4604> of those that had been carried away;<WH1473> and I<WH589> sat<WH3427> astonished<WH8074> until<WH5704> the evening<WH6153> sacrifice.<WH4503>

And said,<WH559> O my God,<WH430> I am ashamed<WH954> and blush<WH3637> to lift up<WH7311> my face<WH6440> to<WH413> thee, my God:<WH430> for<WH3588> our iniquities<WH5771> are increased<WH7235> over<WH4605> our head,<WH7218> and our trespass<WH819> is grown up<WH1431> unto<WH5704> the heavens.<WH8064>

Since the days<WH4480> <WH3117> of our fathers<WH1> have we<WH587> been in a great<WH1419> trespass<WH819> unto<WH5704> this<WH2088> day;<WH3117> and for our iniquities<WH5771> have we,<WH587> our kings,<WH4428> and our priests,<WH3548> been delivered<WH5414> into the hand<WH3027> of the kings<WH4428> of the lands,<WH776> to the sword,<WH2719> to captivity,<WH7628> and to a spoil,<WH961> and to confusion<WH1322> of face,<WH6440> as it is this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>

For <WH3588> we<WH587> were bondmen;<WH5650> yet our God<WH430> hath not<WH3808> forsaken<WH5800> us in our bondage,<WH5659> but hath extended<WH5186> mercy<WH2617> unto<WH5921> us in the sight<WH6440> of the kings<WH4428> of Persia,<WH6539> to give<WH5414> us a reviving,<WH4241> to set up<WH7311> <WH853> the house<WH1004> of our God,<WH430> and to repair<WH5975> <WH853> the desolations<WH2723> thereof, and to give<WH5414> us a wall<WH1447> in Judah<WH3063> and in Jerusalem.<WH3389>
And now,<WH6258> O our God,<WH430> what<WH4100> shall we say<WH559> after<WH310> this?<WH2063> for<WH3588> we have forsaken<WH5800> thy commandments,<WH4687>

Which <WH834> thou hast commanded<WH6680> by<WH3027> thy servants<WH5650> the prophets,<WH5030> saying,<WH559> The land,<WH776> unto which<WH834> ye<WH859> go<WH935> to possess<WH3423> it, is an unclean<WH5079> land<WH776> with the filthiness<WH5079> of the people<WH5971> of the lands,<WH776> with their abominations,<WH8441> which<WH834> have filled<WH4390> it from one end<WH4480> <WH6310> to<WH413> another<WH6310> with their uncleanness.<WH2932>

Now <WH6258> therefore give<WH5414> not<WH408> your daughters<WH1323> unto their sons,<WH1121> neither<WH408> take<WH5375> their daughters<WH1323> unto your sons,<WH1121> nor<WH3808> seek<WH1875> their peace<WH7965> or their wealth<WH2896> forever:<WH5704> <WH5769> that<WH4616> ye may be strong,<WH2388> and eat<WH398> <WH853> the good<WH2898> of the land,<WH776> and leave it for an inheritance<WH3423> to your children<WH1121> forever.<WH5704> <WH5769>

And after<WH310> all<WH3605> that is come<WH935> upon<WH5921> us for our evil<WH7451> deeds,<WH4639> and for our great<WH1419> trespass,<WH819> seeing<WH3588> that thou<WH859> our God<WH430> hast punished<WH2820> us less<WH4295> than our iniquities<WH4480> <WH5771> deserve, and hast given<WH5414> us such deliverance<WH6413> as this;<WH2063>

Should we again<WH7725> break<WH6565> thy commandments,<WH4687> and join in affinity<WH2859> with the people<WH5971> of these<WH428> abominations?<WH8441> wouldest not<WH3808> thou be angry<WH599> with us till<WH5704> thou hadst consumed<WH3615> us, so that there should be no<WH369> remnant<WH7611> nor escaping?<WH6413>

O LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> thou<WH859> art righteous:<WH6662> for<WH3588> we remain<WH7604> yet escaped,<WH6413> as it is this<WH2063> day:<WH3117> behold,<WH2009> we are before<WH6440> thee in our trespasses:<WH819> for<WH3588> we cannot<WH369> stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> thee because<WH5921> of this.<WH2088>
